ttp_template:
<group name="loc_prf_metric_network_next_hop">
BGP rout{{PATH | ORPHRASE}}ng table information for VRF default
Router identifier 192.168.1.1, local AS number 65{{METRIC | ORPHRASE}}{{WEIGHT}}0
>  10.1.1.0/24  192.168.1.2  0  {{LOC_PRF | ORPHRASE}}  0 i
BGP routing table information for VRF {{VRF | ORPHRASE}}
>  {{NETWORK}}  {{NEXT_HOP | ORPHRASE}}  0  100  0 i
</group>
cli_content:
BGP routing table information for VRF default
Router identifier 192.168.1.1, local AS number 65000
BGP table version is 10, main routing table version 10

Status codes: s suppressed, d damped, h history, * valid, > best, i internal,
              S Stale, R Removed
Origin codes: i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete

   Network          Next Hop            Metric LocPrf Weight Path
>  10.1.1.0/24      192.168.1.2              0    100      0 i
   10.2.2.0/24      192.168.1.2              0    100      0 65001 i
   10.3.3.0/24      192.168.1.3              0    100      0 65002 ?

BGP routing table information for VRF blue
Router identifier 192.168.2.1, local AS number 65001
BGP table version is 5, main routing table version 5

   Network          Next Hop            Metric LocPrf Weight Path
>  192.168.10.0/24  10.1.1.1                0    100      0 i
   192.168.20.0/24  10.2.2.1                0    100      0 65002 i
textfsm_template:
Value Required VRF (\S+)
Value NETWORK (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\/\d+)
Value NEXT_HOP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value METRIC (\d+)
Value LOC_PRF (\d+)
Value WEIGHT (\d+)
Value PATH (\S+)

Start
  ^BGP routing table information for VRF\s+${VRF}\s*$$
  ^ *Network *Next Hop *Metric *LocPrf *Weight *Path\s*$$
  ^(\*|>)?\s*${NETWORK}\s+${NEXT_HOP}\s+${METRIC}\s+${LOC_PRF}\s+${WEIGHT}\s+${PATH}\s*$$ -> Record
